title: Teemo Q VS the Blind Monk
body: This is something I've been thinking about a while: Shouldn't {{champion:64}}  be immune to {{champion:17}}s Q ability? I mean seriously {{champion:64}} is already blind, does {{champion:17}}s Q make him deaf or makes him unable to smell properly? Honestly this is unrealistic.

replies.body: yeah it is like how can ignite kill brand.. doesn't seem logical but its a game..
I just don't like how it's a bit unrealistic, I mean srsly the dudes already blind, so how he get blinded again?
its a game where you kill huge frogs and dragons and a massive snake, being realistic has gone out the window.. come on man, relax man.

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Vthk3rVN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-26T12:33:51.800+0000)
>
> its a game where you kill huge frogs and dragons and a massive snake, being realistic has gone out the window.. come on man, relax man.

Also u missed the tree monster that somehow gives u the ability to ate ppl on fire and the rock monster that lets u spam abilities

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Vthk3rVN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-26T12:33:51.800+0000)
>
> its a game where you kill huge frogs and dragons and a massive snake, being realistic has gone out the window.. come on man, relax man.

Yeh I guess so
Somehow a jester can teleport and everyone is scared of clowns (jack in the box)
It would be unrealistic to add this in, thematic representation of characters isn't as much of an issue as gameplay.

Do you really think Teemo's singular blinding dart hits two eyes against every champion? The icon shows it hitting someone in the neck and we can just assume its a nerve poison thing and that it doesn't only have to mess with someone's vision. The real question here is Quinn blinding Lee SIn, hahaha
I kind agree, I will quit If this isn't fixed soon
